metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35996 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple improper array index validation vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 tdelta functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the tdelta indexing when signal_lens is 0.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
